 2018-07392018-06-11,  ,  PSPC,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of WILLIAM ANGUS WATT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a director of the board of directors of Defence Construction (1951) Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Jean Marc Ouellet, whose term has expired.
